message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present this extraordinary product to you. It's a unique opportunity that I believe could greatly benefit you. Before we proceed, I'd like to offer you the chance to own it at an exclusive price of $8500. This is a special offer tailored for someone with discerning taste and appreciation for exceptional quality. I'm confident it will be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Let me know if you're interested in exploring this further.
